author: jmcnally
msg: remove unnecessary throws clause from getObjectInstance.
implement Serializable using the ObjectFactory to maintain state.
test that serialization does not cause an exception.

author: tobrien
msg: The DBCP project.xml now extends the shared Jakarta Commons project.xml.  The project.properties file is configured to put the generation date and version on the maven site, and the navigation.xml now references the shared xml nav for Commons.
